DOC.brief_summary: The main objective determine whether immune response Tdap ( GlaxoSmithKline , Boostrix® ) HPV vaccine ( Merck & Co. , Inc. , Gardasil® ) administer concomitantly MenACWY comparable response elicit vaccine give alone .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 4 , Placebo-Controlled , Randomized Study Evaluate Immunogenicity Safety HPV Tdap When Administered With MenACWY Adolescents
